entities.name: fat pony
entities.description: The fat pony is mentioned as a character in the story, specifically as someone who toasted Harry and his friends with mead.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends, who responds to the fat pony's toast by calling him a 'scurvy cur'.

entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is mentioned as someone who roars out a greeting to Harry and his friends.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who collects the Firebolt and tries to find something to do with it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends, who comes into the common room accompanied by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the head of Gryffindor House and makes a grave announcement to Harry in the past.

relationships.description: Harry owns the Firebolt, which he collects from the dormitory.
Ron is Harry's friend, who sits with him admiring the Firebolt.
Hermione comes into the common room accompanied by Professor McGonagall.
Harry and Ron are friends, who sit together admiring the Firebolt.
Hermione gave Harry the Broomstick Servicing Kit for his birthday, which includes the Firebolt.
